snippet.title: Life is Feudal: Arden
snippet.description:
The wait is over! We are thrilled to announce Life is Feudal: Arden, a brand-new game featuring an exciting new map! Unlike the original Life is Feudal: MMO, Arden will be a standalone experience with free-to-play access and numerous updates to game mechanics tailored specifically for the new map.

To ensure the highest quality gameplay and gather your valuable feedback on the new mechanics, we’ve planned several testing stages. We deeply value the contributions of our active Life is Feudal: MMO community, and we can't wait to see you at the first stage, set to launch by the end of 2024. 

Adventure awaits, Feudals!

Learn more and purchase early access packs: https://lifeisfeudalarden.com
